text: The Niagara IceDogs are a Canadian ice hockey team. They began playing in 1998. The team currently plays in the Ontario Hockey League (OHL). They play their home games in St. Catharines, Ontario at the Meridian Centre. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Ice hockey teams in Ontario Category:Ontario Hockey League teams Category:1998 establishments in Canada
title: Niagara IceDogs
